name: WP Obituary Manager
author: WPTaskForce.com

sections.description:
Demo

WP Obituary is free plugin for managing your obituary and condolences in your own WordPress admin dashboard. This obituary management software is for funeral homes, crematory and cemeteries. WP Obituary allows enable you to display online obituaries on your website and allow visitors to post moderated condolences. This plugin can be modify to make this plugin work for your needs. WP Obituary Manager is developed by WPTaskforce.com a website and design agency in Iloilo City Philippines.

Core Plugin Features

  • Obituary Submit Form
  • Manage Obituary
  • Obituary Slider Shortcode
  • Condolence Management
  • Print Support

Contact us to import or migrate your existing obituaries into WP Obituary Manager.
Contact us on Skype: arni.cinco
sections.installation:
1. Upload WP_Obituary.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory or Search WP Obituary Manager in you WordPress admin dashboard add new plugin page

  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress Dashboard

  3. Add your Obituary Default Thumnail and Obituary Default layout in Obituaries -> Settings

  4. Visit your Obituaries page to www.yourdomain.com/obituaries
sections.faq:
• How can I add the Obituary?

You can add it dashboard under obituary postype. Or in obituary submit form in front end.

  • How can I access my obituary Page?

You can visit your obituaries page to www.yourdomain.com/obituaries

  • How to manage consolences?

Condolences are manage in comments in WordPress admin dashboard.
sections.changelog:
2.0.3

  • Changed text Post Comment to Submit Condolences
  • Changed text Leave a Comments to Offer Condolences
  • Updated Obituary to Obituaries url

2.0.2

  • Fixed issue in WordPress 6.2.2
  • Updated Plugin Name

2.0.0

  • Created Obituary postype
  • Added Online submit form in fron end.
  • Allowed user to manage all submit obituary
